original_text: And he shall take away all the fat thereof, as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace offerings; and the priest shall burn it upon the altar for a sweet savour unto the Lord; and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and it shall be forgiven him.
korean_text: 그 모든 기름을 화목제물의 기름을 떼어낸 것 같이 떼어내 제단 위에서 불살라 여호와께 향기롭게 할지니 제사장이 그를 위하여 속죄한즉 그가 사함을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: And he shall take away all the fat thereof
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 기름 모두를 가져가야 하며

sentences.original_text: as the fat is taken away from off the sacrifice of peace offerings
and the priest shall burn it upon the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 그것을 단 위에서 불살라야 하며

sentences.original_text: for a sweet savour unto the Lord
and the priest shall make an atonement for him
and it shall be forgiven him
